Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Prohibits medical parole for persons convicted of an act of terrorism
Summary: Relates to prohibiting medical parole for persons convicted of an act of terrorism.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to prohibiting medical parole for persons convicted of an act of terrorism
